value:
$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|You want to personally hire me?$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|That's right. The Dieck Mercenaries
are known even in Bern.$k$pWould you add your strength
to my own?$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|I'm not sure I understand. We
both serve under the Order of
Heroes, do we not?$k$pWhat reason would there be to
go out of your way to hire me?$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|I ask for Princess Guinivere.$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|The princess of Bern? I still struggle
to understand.$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|Dieck, you were summoned around
the same time we were. Not much
time has passed since we arrived.$k$pHave you built many connections
with your fellow Heroes in such
short a time?$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|Well, some acquaintances, but no one
who I'd trust to truly have my back,
I suppose.$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|As with us. So we would ask that
you place the protection of the
princess as your highest priority.$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|Before even a threat to Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|Yes. That would be the purpose
of taking you under employ.$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|I see. I'm to be Dieck, Princess
Protector then, am I?$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|This world houses dangers I cannot
yet imagine.$k$pFor that reason, adding even one
blade to the princess's guard is
a crucial step forward.$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|I think I understand now. Let me
think about it.$k$p$WmMPID_ミレディ,ch02_28_Milady_F_Normal,Face|We will await your answer and
hope to receive good news.$k$p...$k$p
